title.rendered: “IDF Strikes Back: Targeting Terror Warehouses and Rocket Launchers in Response to Attacks on Sderot and Gaza Vicinity”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

Operational warehouses, terror infrastructures and rocket launchers; the IDF attacked targets from which launches were identified this morning towards Sderot and the Gaza vicinity communities.

This morning (Tuesday), four launches were identified crossing from the Beit Lahia region towards the city of Sderot, and an additional launch crossed from the Gaza City region towards the Gaza vicinity communities, all launches crossed into Israeli territory were successfully intercepted by the air defense forces.

The Air Force fighter jets, in cooperation with the Southern Command Fire Center and the Gaza Division, attacked a number of targets from where the launches were identified, including operational warehouses, terror infrastructures, and a launcher with rockets ready to be fired into Israeli territory.

Attached is documentation from the attacks: https://bit.ly/44dLWbZ
